author: Techlearner71
body: I'm not sure but I have noticed my PC has been having issues lately. I haven't been able to restore or reset my PC the last few attempts that I made to do so. After the PC would restart it would say that the retore could not be completed and that no files would be lost. But sometimes I would notice my files wouldn't even open.
title: Is my system compromised? will Power Shell be affected by this if my system is compromised?
